definitions.definition: an official document that may be used to prove that the facts it states are true

examples.text: The police are waiting for the doctor to issue a death certificate.
She showed her certificate of insurance.
Everyone entering the country needs to show a health certificate.
This certificate is an important document. Keep it in a safe place.

definitions.definition: an official document proving that you have completed a course of study or passed an exam; a qualification obtained after a course of study or an exam

examples.text: a Postgraduate Certificate in Education *(= a British qualification for teachers)*
A certificate of completion will be issued to all who complete the course.

wordOrigin: late Middle English (in the sense ‘certification’): from French certificat or medieval Latin certificatum, from certificare, from Latin certus ‘certain’.
